chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 has a problem: It's necessary to add my ID number in invoice 52864545B. Thank you,

Dear Ecomobile 

The customer has requested to add the VAT number to his invoice, you can help us by generating this invoice.

The customer has requested the following to be added to his invoice:
NIF: 52864545B

Could you please send us the invoice within 48 hours?
We appreciate your help in this process.

Regards,
Zayra from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice with the VAT number.

Regards,
JY
